name: Aboleth
description: Enormous, antediluvian catfish covered in slime and tentacles. They hate all intelligent beings.
ability_1: Curse. DC 15 CON or target gains a magical curse, turning into a deep one over 2d10 days.
ability_2: Enslave. In place of attacks, one creature within far DC 15 WIS or aboleth controls for 1d4 rounds.
ability_3: Telepathic. Read the thoughts of all creatures within far.

name: Acolyte
description: A religious trainee who knows basic rites and rituals.
spell_1: Healing Touch. DC 11. Heal one creature within close for 1d4 HP.

name: Animated Armor
description: An old suit of armor magically animated by a vengeful spirit.
ability_1: Statue. When standing still, looks exactly like a suit of armor.

name: Bandit
description: Hard-bitten rogue in tattered leathers and a hooded cloak.
ability_1: Ambush. Deal an extra die of damage when undetected.

name: Bat, Giant
description: Leathery, eagle-sized mammal with a taste for flesh.

name: Bear, Brown
description: A hulking, swaying brute with claws as long as a finger.
ability_1: Crush. Deals an extra die of damage if it hits the same target with both claws.

name: Beastman
description: A cave hominid with scraggly fur and a stone-tipped spear.
ability_1: Brutal. +1 damage with melee weapons (included).

name: Boar
description: Ornery wild pig with bristly, russet hair and yellowed tusks.
ability_1: Gore. Deals an extra die of damage if it hits the same target with both tusks.

name: Cave Brute
description: A hulking, insectoid beast with long mandibles, four eyes, and thick arms covered in bristles.
ability_1: Bewilder. Creatures within near that see the cave brute's eyes, DC 12 CHA at start of their turn or dazed and no action.

name: Cave Creeper
description: Chittering centipedes the size of horses with grasping tentacles.
ability_1: Toxin. DC 12 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

name: Crocodile
description: Fat, scaly reptiles with stumpy legs and long, thrashing tails.

name: Cultist
description: A cloaked, wild-eyed zealot chanting the guttural prayers of a dark god.
ability_1: Fearless. Immune to morale checks.
spell_1: Deathtouch. DC 12. 2d4 damage to one creature within close.

name: Darkmantle
description: A floating, black octopus with rows of red eyes and a webbed skirt of tentacles.
spell_1: Darkness. Extinguish all light sources in near (magic 3:6).

name: Dragon, Swamp
description: This black, wingless beast slithers through dank swamps.
ability_1: Smog Breath. Fills a near-sized cube extending from dragon. DC 15 CON or 2d10 damage and blinded for 1 round.

name: Dryad
description: A coy, emerald-skinned fey covered in leaves. It bonds with and protects a tree.
ability_1: Meld. Step inside bonded tree.
spell_1: Charm. Near, one creature, DC 14 CHA or friendship for 1d8 days.

name: Dung Beetle, Giant
description: A trundling, barrel-sized beetle with a T-shaped horn.
ability_1: Knock. DC 9 STR or pushed a close distance and fall down.

name: Ettercap
description: Bipedal, eight-eyed spiderfolk with spindly legs and purple fur.
ability_1: Poison Web. One target stuck in place and 1d4 damage/round. DC 12 DEX to escape on turn.

name: Fairy
description: Miniature fey folk with fluttering moth or butterfly wings.
ability_1: Poison. DC 12 CON or fall into deep sleep for 1d4 hours.

name: Gelatinous Cube
description: A translucent cube of slime that silently mows through tunnels.
ability_1: Engulf. DC 12 STR or trapped inside cube. Touch attack auto-hits engulfed targets each round. DC 12 STR on turn to escape. Fail checks if paralyzed.

name: Ghost
description: A wavering spirit with a face contorted in rage or sadness.
attack: 2 death touch +5 (1d8 + life drain) or 1 possess
ability_1: Greater Undead. Immune to morale checks. Only damaged by silver or magical sources.
ability_2: Life Drain. 1d4 CON damage. Death if reduced to 0 CON.
ability_3: Possess. One target, close range. Contested Charisma check. If ghost wins, it inhabits the target's body and controls its actions for 2d4 rounds.

name: Gnome, Deep
description: Gray-skinned, white-haired fey the size of halflings. They hunt for gems and rare cave flora.
ability_1: Stone Meld. 2/day, underground only. Turn invisible for 3 rounds.

name: Goblin
description: A short, hairless humanoid with green skin and pointy ears.
ability_1: Keen Senses. Can't be surprised.

name: Golem, Stone
description: A wide-limbed, lumbering statue that shakes the ground.
ability_1: Golem. Immune to damage from fire, cold, electricity, or non-magical sources.
spell_1: Slow. Far range, one target. DC 15 CON or speed halved 1d4 rounds.

name: Grick
description: A huge worm with four suckered tentacles and a snapping beak.
ability_1: Camouflage. Hard to see in cave terrain or rocks.
ability_2: Grab. Target is immobilized. Contested Strength check on turn to break free.

name: Hobgoblin
description: A sturdy, tall goblin with russet skin. Militant and strategic.
ability_1: Phalanx. +1 to attacks and AC when in close range of an allied hobgoblin.

name: Knight
description: A warrior in shining plate mail and the surcoat of a knightly order.
ability_1: Oath. 3/day, ADV on a roll made in service of knight's order.

name: Kobold
description: Puny, scaled coyote-lizards that dwell underground.
ability_1: Dodge. 1/day, an attack that would hit misses instead.

name: Leech, Giant
description: A glossy black, blood-drinking slug as large as a cat.
ability_1: Attach. Attach to target; bite auto-hits next round. DC 12 STR on turn to tear off.

name: Minotaur
description: Ferocious bull-men with hooves and curved horns. They live in mazelike tunnels.
ability_1: Charge. In place of attacks, move up to double near in a straight line and make 1 horn attack. If hit, x2 damage.

name: Moose
description: A towering, brown-haired grazer with weighty, flat antlers.

name: Ochre Jelly
description: An orange puddle of quivering slime.
ability_1: Split. If cut or chopped, split into two smaller oozes (divide remaining HP between both). Can split up to four times.

name: Ogre
description: A massive, dim-witted brute with tusks and a heavy frame. Often lords over goblins or orcs.

name: Orc
description: A tusked, tall humanoid with gray skin and pointed ears.
ability_1: Rage. 1/day, immune to morale checks, +1d4 damage (3 rounds).

name: Peasent
description: A commoner in worn clothes.

name: Rat, Giant
description: Cunning rats as large as cats. Mangy fur and wormlike tails.
ability_1: Disease. DC 12 CON or 1d4 CON damage (can't heal while ill). Repeat check once per day; ends on success. Die at 0 CON.

name: Reaver
description: A knight in blackened armor riddled with cruel barbs.
ability_1: Bloodlust. +2 damage with melee weapons (included).

name: Rust Monster
description: A mud-brown insect as big as a wolf with two feathery antennae. Consumes metal.
ability_1: Corrosive. Metal that touches the rust monster is destroyed on a d6 roll of 1-3.

name: Scarab, Swarm
description: A chittering cloud of iridescent, oval-shaped beetles.

name: Skeleton
description: A bleach-boned skeleton with red pinpoints of light in its eyes.
ability_1: Undead. Immune to morale checks.

name: Snake, Giant
description: An enormous, mottled serpent that can swallow a cow whole.
ability_1: Constrict. Contested STR to hold target immobile for one round.

name: Soldier
description: An armed footsoldier trained in the ways of battlefield combat.

name: Spider, Giant
description: Bulbous abdomen and eight, spindly legs. Ambush hunter.
ability_1: Poison. DC 12 CON or paralyzed 1d4 hours.

name: Spider, Swarm
description: A scurrying carpet of spiders.
ability_1: Poison. DC 12 CON or paralyzed 1d4 hours.

name: Stingbat
description: Darting, orange insect-bat with four wings and needlelike beak.
ability_1: Blood Drain. Attach to bitten target; auto-hit the next round. DC 9 STR on turn to remove.

name: Troll
description: Green, lanky giants with warty skin and territorial rage. Lair in deep forests and swamps.
ability_1: Regenerate. Regains 2d6 HP on its turn unless its wounds are cauterized with fire or acid.

name: Unicorn
description: A silvery horse with a flowing mane and a single spiral horn.
ability_1: Healing Horn. A touch heals 2d6 HP or ends one curse or disease.

name: Wasp, Giant
description: Man-sized wasps with glossy, yellow-striped abdomens.
ability_1: Venom. DC 9 CON or go to 0 HP.

name: Weald Hag
description: Eyes dark as moonless nights, skin made of rotting wood, hair of tangled roots and vines.
ability_1: Drink Pain. Near range. DC 12 CHA to deal 2d4 damage to a creature; regain that many HP.
ability_2: Shapechange. Instantly change to look like any other humanoid.

name: Werewolf
description: A bipedal, wolf-faced humanoid covered in brown fur.
ability_1: Impervious. Only damaged by silver or magic sources.
ability_2: Lycanthropy. If 12 or more damage from the same werewolf, contract lycanthropy.

name: Wight
description: A pale, armored undead warrior with sinister intelligence.
ability_1: Greater Undead. Immune to morale checks. Only damaged by silver or magical sources.
ability_2: Life Drain. 1d4 CON damage. Death if reduced to 0 CON.

name: Will-O'-Wisp
description: A bobbing marsh light animated by an evil spirit. It tries to lead the living into danger.
ability_1: Life Drain. 1d4 CON damage. Death if reduced to 0 CON.

name: Wolf
description: A giant canine with a gray pelt, yellow eyes, and dripping jaws.
ability_1: Pack Hunter. Deals +1 damage while next to an ally.

name: Angel, Archangel
description: A radiant being with a crown of fire, snowy wings, golden armor, and a blazing greatsword.
ability_1: Command. DC 18 CHA to resist an archangel's command.
ability_2: Crown of Fire. Hostile spells targeting the archangel are extreme (DC 18) to cast.

name: Angel, Domini
description: Winged, flawless humans glowing with bronze sunlight.
ability_1: Horn. All enemies in near DC 15 CHA or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

name: Angel, Principi
description: Serene humans sculpted from alabaster. Golden orbs for eyes.
ability_1: Moonlight Aura. Hostile spells targeting the principi are DC 15.
ability_2: Truesight. Can see all invisible creatures and objects.

name: Angel, Seraph
description: Beautiful, luminous humanoids with white-feathered wings.
ability_1: Bless. 3/day, touch one target to give it a luck token.

name: Ankheg
description: Horse-sized, rust-brown insects. They burrow vast, underground warrens into the bedrock.

name: Ape
description: Hooting, omnivorous apes that live in trees.

name: Ape, Snow
description: White-haired, carnivorous gorillas that stalk the high mountains and live in caves.
ability_1: Thick Fur. Cold immune.

name: Apprentice
description: A cloaked magician with a thin, freshly bound spellbook.
spell_1: Beguile (INT Spell). DC 11. Focus. One target in near of LV 2 or less is stupefied for the duration.
spell_2: Magic Bolt (INT Spell). DC 11. 1d4 damage to one target within far.

name: Archmage
description: A wizened magic-user crackling with arcane power.
spell_1: Death Bolt (INT Spell). DC 15. One target of LV 9 or less within near DC 15 CON or go to 0 HP.
spell_2: Enervate (INT Spell). DC 14. Focus. One target within near is stupefied for the duration.
spell_3: Fireblast (INT Spell). DC 14. 4d6 damage to all within a near- sized cube within far.
spell_4: Float (INT Spell). Self. DC 14. Fly double near for 5 rounds.
spell_5: Mithralskin (INT Spell). Self. DC 14. AC becomes 18 for 5 rounds.
spell_6: Void Step (INT Spell). Self and up to 4 willing targets. DC 15. Teleport up to 100 miles.

name: Assassin
description: A black-cloaked, skulking killer.
ability_1: Execute. Deals x3 damage against surprised targets.

name: Azer
description: Dwarves with bronze, metallic skin and flames in place of hair. Gifted blacksmiths.
attack: 2 flaming warhammer +3 (1d10, ignites flammables) or 1 crossbow (far) +0 (1d6)
ability_1: Impervious. Fire immune.

name: Badger
description: Fierce, clawed burrowers with black-and-white face stripes.
ability_1: Rage. 1/day, immune to morale checks, +1d4 damage (3 rounds).

name: Basilisk
description: Massive, muscled lizards with six legs and gray, tough hide.
ability_1: Petrify. Any creature that touches the basilisk or meets its gaze, DC 15 CON or petrified.

name: Bat, Swarm
description: A whirling cloud of screeching, bloodthirsty bats.

name: Bear, Polar
description: A mighty, white bear that thrives in arctic environments.
ability_1: Crush. Deals an extra die of damage if it hits the same target with both claws.

name: Berserker
description: Howling, battleraging warriors.
ability_1: Rage. 1/day, immune to morale checks, +1d4 damage (3 rounds).

name: Black Pudding
description: A black, ice-cold mass of sludge.
ability_1: Impervious. Only damaged by fire.
ability_2: Corrosive. Wood or metal that touches the ooze dissolves on a d6 roll of 1-3.

name: Brain Eater
description: Purple, gaunt humanoids with squidlike heads and four face tentacles. They live in complex, alien societies underground and eat humanoid brains.
attack: 4 tentacle +5 (1d8 + latch) or 1 mind blast or 1 mind control
ability_1: Hear Thoughts. Can hear the surface thoughts of all intelligent creatures within near.
ability_2: Latch. Tentacles attach to hit targets, automatically hitting the next round (DC 12 STR to remove 1d4 tentacles). If all four remain latched onto the same humanoid target for 1 round, the target's brain is ripped out and devoured.
ability_3: Mind Blast. Fills a near-sized cube extending from brain eater. DC 15 INT or 3d6 damage and paralyzed 1d4 rounds.
ability_4: Mind Control. One target in near DC 15 CHA or brain eater controls for 1d4 rounds.

name: Bugbear
description: Brutish, bat-eared goblinoids covered in brown fur.
ability_1: Stealthy. ADV on checks to sneak and hide.

name: Bulette
description: A hulking, shark-sized lizard with a steely, arrow-shaped carapace and a massive gullet.
ability_1: Leap. Jump up to near in height and double near in distance, then make 2 bite attacks.

name: Camel
description: Ornery, tan-furred desert beasts.

name: Centaur
description: Herd-dwelling beings with the upper body of a human and lower body of a horse.

name: Centipede, Giant
description: Blood-red, feathery centipedes the size of a human arm. Their bite injects a burning poison that cramps muscles.
ability_1: Poison. DC 12 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

name: Centipede, Swarm
description: A crawling mass of weaving, sinuous centipedes.
ability_1: Poison. DC 12 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

name: Chimera
description: A monstrous beast with a half-goat, half-lion body, wide dragon wings, and the heads of a goat, lion, and dragon.
ability_1: Fire Breath. Fills a near-sized cube extending from chimera. DC 15 DEX or 4d6 damage.

name: Chuul
description: Brown, horse-sized lobster bugs with tentacles and pincers.
ability_1: Grab. DC 15 STR or held in pincer. DC 15 STR to break free on turn.

name: Cloaker
description: A midnight blue manta ray with a bony tail and crescent-shaped maw above its belly. It swoops through deep, lightless caverns.
ability_1: Phantoms. 1/day, in place of attacks. Create 3 illusory duplicates that disappear when hit. Determine randomly if an attack hits cloaker or illusions.
ability_2: Screech. Enemies within double near DC 15 WIS or DISADV on attacks and checks 1d4 rounds.

name: Cockatrice
description: A molting, lizard-chicken hybrid with a crimson, razorlike crest.
ability_1: Petrify. DC 12 CON or petrified.

name: Couatl
description: A human-sized snake with scales made of jewels and a corona of iridescent feathers.
ability_1: Change Shape. In place of attacks, transform into any similarly-sized creature.
ability_2: Poison. DC 15 CON or fall into natural, deep sleep for 1d8 hours.
ability_3: Restore. In place of attacks, touch one creature to remove a curse, affliction, or heal 3d8 HP.

name: Crab, Giant
description: A wagon-sized, armored crab with two crushing pincers.
ability_1: Crush. DC 15 STR or target takes 1d8 damage.

name: Cyclops
description: Reclusive, one-eyed giants towering 20' high. They live simply on remote farmlands.
